description: Listed building consent application in connection with works at platform level including installation of OPO cameras and support structures, train stopping markers and relocation of platform end barriers.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The temporary installation of the OPO cameras and associated supports and brackets hereby permitted shall be for a period of 36 months only.  The Local Planning Authority shall be informed in writing of the date of installation of the cameras and associate supports and brackets.

REASON:  In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building included in the Statutory List by ensuring that there is no long term impact on its fabric. Furthermore, the Council is prepared to grant listed building consent only for a limited period to ensure that arrangements are satisfactory during the period of testing and implementation of new London Underground train stock.
